export TM_MODULE_TITLE=`perl <<<$TM_NEW_FILE_BASENAME -pe 'y/_/ /; s/(?:^|\b)(.)/uc($1)/ge'`
TM_INFO_FILE="$TM_NEW_FILE_DIRECTORY/$TM_NEW_FILE_BASENAME.info"
if [[ ! (-f $TM_NEW_FILE || -f $TM_INFO_FILE) ]]; then perl -pe 's/\$\{([^}]*)\}/$ENV{$1}/g' < module.module > "$TM_NEW_FILE" perl -pe 's/\$\{([^}]*)\}/$ENV{$1}/g' < module.info > "$TM_INFO_FILE" fi
